title: I'm Betting These Project Skins are Gonna Have a Shared Splash
body: except for maybe Project Yi since he's the legendary skin of the group.

replies.body:
Yo Toa of Death!

All of the project skins have their own splash images, so no shared splash this time. :D

YES! I have observed that individual splasharts have so much more quality than grouped ones, where the image is artificially created to be able to "cut out" the individual images for champion loading screen. In individual ones, it is an artwork all by its own, like a painting, without the limitations to be able to fit 3-5 champions in a picture. Please Rito more individual splashes!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:23:02.106+0000)
>
> Yo Toa of Death!
> 
> All of the project skins have their own splash images, so no shared splash this time. :D

I think Zed should be more expensive. I mean, his animation and skin is INSANE compared to other Project skins! He's the only Project skin that has the best utility belt

> [{quoted}](name=Raid3n,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=00000005,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:44:19.719+0000)
>
> I think Zed should be more expensive. I mean, his animation and skin is INSANE compared to other Project skins! He's the only Project skin that has the best utility belt

Don't ask for a price raise on skins, what the hell is wrong with you
LOL ikr why would you ask for a price increase
Lol why would you say that, what if they actually do so shush, but that is true.
Will all of the PROJECT skins be able to have a purchasable bundle or will I have to buy separate
Thank god. I mean it may have looked cool but these skins are too awesome to not have their own splashes.
I feel like Leona and Lucian should share a splash though :c
Yeah, they'd be pretty cool sharing one. The rest though could do without them.
Have you thought about, for Wallpaper purposes having a shared image though? For those of us who like having League-themed Wallpapers.
I recommend setting up a slideshow for your wallpaper. I've got about 110 or so various splash arts and poro-champions cycling every 30 seconds.

will there be a group art like how arcade have one with all of them but it isn't a splash for any of them 
http://s.lolstatic.com/site/skins-arcade/ff906c7f62b2ff24f60a10fdeeb4803fbb1fd7c3/images/extras/wallpaper/Arcade_Art_1920x1080.jpg
I was about to guess yes, but then I realized Yi will probably be the one with the login image for that patch, considering he's getting the 1820 skin.
So is this confirming that Yi will be 1850 RP?
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/08/820-pbe-update.html
1850... isn't a price. It's 1820.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:23:02.106+0000)
>
> Yo Toa of Death!
> 
> All of the project skins have their own splash images, so no shared splash this time. :D

Thank god. Each of those skins deserve their own splash art! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:23:02.106+0000)
>
> Yo Toa of Death!
> 
> All of the project skins have their own splash images, so no shared splash this time. :D

HALLELUJAH!

Now, can Riot stop doing shared skins for _every_ skin set? Please?
Praise the tech! Thanks guys! :D
{{champion:238}} hype

Someone has actually announced on Twitter that the artists are actually trying something they've never done before with the splash arts of them all. Perhaps if you join the splashes all together it will create a full image, like a jigsaw piece?
Maybe animated splashes? Or is it just a dream of mine? :S
They have that for 3250RP skins only.
just like the way they recall
not having Project: Diana seems like a real missed opportunity

Not see the missed opportunity BUT i would love it tough.

Im okay because i hope they are just making Blood Moon Diana (Please don't giver her cleavage,Please don't giver her cleavage,Please don't giver her cleavage)
PLEASE GIVE HER CLEAVAGE PLEASE GIVE HER CLEAVAGE
I hope you die, for real, now you are not worth live anymore, and if you die in pain is better.
Okay miss coma, call down. It's a joke. Though I would like it, but it's my opinion. You have the right to express yours but not to diss mine. Okay, bye.
Of course i was joking too dude XD
I'm getting real annoyed with all these shared splash art skins.... It's kinda a rip off imo. And it just seems lazy...

Shared splash exist because it helps the speed of the production.

I mean come on, you get FREE MINIONS with this skins and GROUP RECALL, i think this skins are a step forward.
Oh yeah I know that, and I think it's totally appropriate to do for the 750 skins. But anything above that i feel deserve their own skins. And yeah that group recall thing is pretty cool xD
hey toa of death, which kanohi do you prefer?
I prefer Jutlin, the Mask of Corruption.

> [{quoted}](name=Toa of Death,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2015-08-21T23:34:01.677+0000)
>
> I prefer Jutlin, the Mask of Corruption.

thats a pretty sick mask. plus, ive kinda preferred makuta antroz anyways. what do you think of the new bionicle? i love the new ones, they really fleshed them out well, cuase screw hero factory

The new Bionicle are alright. I like how they stayed with the original 6 Toa so that the old Bionicle isn't completely forgotten. I like the old Bionicle's story more though. Hero Factory was complete garbage, I mean the villains looked cool but everything else was just stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Toa of Death,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=0006000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T18:13:51.644+0000)
>
> The new Bionicle are alright. I like how they stayed with the original 6 Toa so that the old Bionicle isn't completely forgotten. I like the old Bionicle's story more though. Hero Factory was complete garbage, I mean the villains looked cool but everything else was just stupid.

ikr? hey, you wanna plat league sometime? you seem like a chill guy. i dont play ranked, but im sure we can have fun :D
Yeah sure. I don't play Ranked either so I think we'll be fine there.
Well, I can't speak for Toa of Death, but my favorite masks are the Avohkii (Your mask, señor Takanuva) or the Olmak, because portals are awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=JohnJonesy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-08-21T15:53:18.612+0000)
>
> Well, I can't speak for Toa of Death, but my favorite masks are the Avohkii (Your mask, señor Takanuva) or the Olmak, because portals are awesome.

you cant beat portals thats for sure. one of my favorites is mahri hewkii's Garai. not only is controlling gravity really powerful, but the mask's edgy look with hewkii's blades and armor and such really make him gladiator like. other favorites is the mask of stealth (Volitak), Matoro's tryna (like the power not the look), lewa classic miru. and the obscure mask of conjuring. ive traditionally been a fan of toa of air and toa of stone, though you gotta respect those ice types

What's so legendary about Master Yi though? He just looks like the rest of the project skins and it seems the only thing extra is the voice over. 
Will he be getting anything else? Cause if 975 (or 1350) RP skins are just gonna be the same quality, without a VO, it doesn't seem legendary.

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q3ZgHdrA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-20T22:49:49.617+0000)
>
> What's so legendary about Master Yi though? He just looks like the rest of the project skins and it seems the only thing extra is the voice over. 
> Will he be getting anything else? Cause if 975 (or 1350) RP skins are just gonna be the same quality, without a VO, it doesn't seem legendary.

The voice is the only thing that's making it a legendary. The particle and modelwork is to justify the fact that the voice makes it a legendary skin.
Doesn't yi have a different dance as well (I'm not sure I havn't played league for 4 or 5 months because I need a new computer and this one can't run league for shit) {{champion:11}} {{champion:238}}

Animations falls into "modelwork" for the most part, as it's still technically working on the model. While a model can be released without new animations; that's not the case here. Even 975 skins have a few new animations. Again, the only reason skins become Legendary is because of a new voice over. Everything else added to that tier of skin is to make the price justified.
He has different animations as well.
:D {{champion:268}}  this
I have a question will project yasuo get fixed the bug that makes him a bit slower compared to the two original skins?

I mean they could be cool with a shared art...clearly they'd have to update Yasuo and have his replaced so all 6 are in the same splash XDD

but nah, they deserve to all have their own unique arts.
